translations: n.内斜坡，陡坡；绝壁，悬崖；（壕沟的）内削壁
v.在……设内斜坡；将……辟成陡坡；磨或切成陡坡；为……筑斜坡

phrs.translation: 悬崖, 斯卡普, 峭壁, 马头丘
海滩崖, 海滩悬崖, 滩崖
鬣崖, 单斜脊崖, 单面山陡崖
山麓崖, 山麓断崖, 山麓断岩, 山麓断层崖

sentences.sentence: The scarp has slopes with grades greater than 60 degrees.
sentences.translation: 这个悬崖的斜坡角度大于60度。

sentences.sentence: Old scarp — Waste recovered from products used by consumers.
sentences.translation: 废旧物——消费者使用过的产品回收。

sentences.sentence: New scarp — waste composed of the residual materials generated during production.
sentences.translation: 新废料——产品生产中含有金属余渣的废料。
